name: Tricky Dodges
description:
A small game created for the WGJ53 with the theme "One Hit".

The goal is to fill your energy bar while avoiding attacks.

The enemies can collect the energy items too and fill their color of the bar (blue).

So try to make sure you don't let an energy item be taken by an enemy!

There are several levels and 4 ranges of levels.

The first level is a TUTORIAL, with only 2 cells in the grid.

Then you have TIER 1, TIER2, and TIER 3 with respectively 4, 6 and  8 cells.

You can moves with the arrow keys or the mouse.

You die in ONE HIT! So avoid the enemies at all cost!

The game can be played on Windows, in your favorite browser supporting it and maybe on Android (not tested but present).

Enjoy, and as usual, your feedback is welcome! :)
